name: Biotechnix
shortDescription: Prosthetics corporation allied with Dr. Octopus to control mutilated influential people
description: Biotechnix technology enables precise capture and analysis of particles. We make possible end-to-end results: particle collection from gas volumes and from surfaces; micro-aerodynamic particle concentration: and delivery to particle analyzers to determine biological, physical and chemical properties.

usps.description: Very Unique Selling Proposition that is so good that all the countries want to buy it
